pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.35: _Idaṁ saṅghassa katikasaṇṭhānaṁ, imaṁ kālaṁ pavisitabbaṁ, imaṁ kālaṁ nikkhamitabbanti_. See [](pli-tv-kd18:1.2.22) for the correct interpretation of this line.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.1: _Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū_ can be read either as referring to two monks, Mettiya and Bhūmajaka, or as a group of monks led by these two. I have not been able to find any clear evidence that it refers to a group, and so I prefer the more straightforward reading that it only refers to the two monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:4.2.6: See [](pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.33) for the rule on abusive speech.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:4.4.6: See [](pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.33) for the rule on abusive speech.
